# Java

```java


import java.util.LinkedList;
import java.util.Queue;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
		static class point{
			int x;
			int y;
			
			point(int x, int y){
				this.x = x;
				this.y = y;
			}
		}
		static int n,m;
		static int[] dx = {-1,1,0,0};
		static int[] dy = {0,0,-1,1};
		static int[][] map;
		static int[][] d;
		static boolean[][] c;
		static Queue<point> q;
		static int d_point=0;
		static int map_point=0;
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated smethod stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		m = sc.nextInt();
		n = sc.nextInt();
		
		map = new int[n][m];
		d = new int[n][m];
		c = new boolean[n][m];
		q = new LinkedList<>();

		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
				map[i][j] = sc.nextInt();
				
				if(map[i][j] ==1) {
					q.add(new point(i,j));
					c[i][j] = true;
				}
			}
		}
		
		
		// 1인 지점에서 다 퍼트리기
		while(!q.isEmpty()) {
			point p = q.remove();
			int x = p.x;
			int y = p.y;
			
			for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++) {
				int nx  = x + dx[k];
				int ny  = y + dy[k];
				
				// out of bound
				
				if(nx <0 || nx >=n || ny <0 || ny >=m) {
					continue;
				}
				
				// already visited
				if(c[nx][ny]) {
					continue;
				}
				
				// wall
				if(map[nx][ny] ==-1) {
					continue;
				}
				
				c[nx][ny] = true;
				d[nx][ny] = d[x][y] +1;
				q.add(new point(nx,ny));
								
			}
		}
		
//		print();
			
		//1 입력 
		
		//2 퍼트리기
		
		//3  검사 다 익지 못하는 경우는 d에서 0의 숫자가 map 의 -1 이랑 1이랑 더한거랑 다른 경
		
		
		if(calculate_point()) {			
			checkMax();
			
		}else {
			System.out.println(-1);
		}
		
		
	}
	private static void checkMax() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int max = 0;
		
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
				if(max < d[i][j]) {
					max  = d[i][j];
				}
			}
		}
		
		System.out.println(max);
		
	}
	private static boolean calculate_point() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
				if(map[i][j] ==1 || map[i][j] ==-1) {
					map_point++;
				}
				
				if(d[i][j] ==0) {
					d_point++;
				}
			}
		}
		
		if(map_point == d_point) {
			return true;
		}else {
			return false;
		}
		
		
	}
	private static void print() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
				System.out.print(d[i][j] + " ");
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
	
}


```
